entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/6. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E24: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/6. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Tóth, Zsolt
3. Sági, Matild
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences, evaluation of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, political and social self-categorization 2. media consumption, evaluations of news from the press, importance of economic and social issues, subjective financial situation, economic expectations (income, unemployment, inflation), evaluation of the economic policy of the government and individual parties, factors influencing the financial situation of the respondent and of Hungary 3. eating habits, evaluaion of dieting methods
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
social behaviour and attitudes
political institutions, public administration
economic conditions and indicators
income, property and savings
family life, marriage, relationship
economic systems and development
mass media
health condition
demography
mass political behavior, attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
